title: Perfect slow cooker pulled pork
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 (1.8kg) pork shoulder', '230ml barbeque sauce', '120ml apple cider vinegar', '120ml chicken stock', '50g light brown sugar', '1 tablespoon American yellow mustard', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 extra large onion, chopped', '2 large cloves garlic, crushed', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried thyme', '8 burger baps, split', '2 tablespoons butter, or as needed']
